templates.label: Summarize a contract in plain English
templates.template: Summarize the contract for a business audience. Include: scope, term, renewal, payment/fees, termination, liability, data protection, governing law. Use bullet points.

templates.label: Negotiation playbook from redlines
templates.template: From the marked-up document and comments, list each issue, our preferred position, fallback, and sample language. Tag risk level (low/med/high).
